desc: Welcome to Pokésports! A podcast, video series, and community. We discuss everything about the competitive scene of Pokémon and its viability as an esport.

layout.text: Pokésports is run by StillJustMike and xRazeOvation, two seasoned Pokémon Content
Creators. On Pokésports, we aim to cover the wide spectrum that is Pokémon games.
